meanings.definition: The quality or state of being irremediable.
meanings.sent1: The irremediableness of the situation left us feeling hopeless.
meanings.sent2: The irremediableness of his mistake meant there was no way to fix it.
meanings.sent3: The irremediableness of the broken toy made the children laugh.
meanings.sent4: The irremediableness of the storm's damage was evident in the flooded streets.
meanings.sent5: The irremediableness of the error was a harsh reality to face.

meanings.definition: The inability to be remedied or corrected.
meanings.sent1: We realized the irremediableness of the leak only after it caused extensive damage.
meanings.sent2: The irremediableness of the stain on the carpet made it impossible to remove.
meanings.sent3: The irremediableness of the traffic jam made everyone late for the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The irremediableness of the misunderstanding led to a strained relationship.
meanings.sent5: The irremediableness of the situation required us to find an alternative solution.
